system.description:
Effect: When declaring this Attack, the user may freely move up to half of the Movement Score of their choice. The user ignores any [Defensive], [Shield], and [Max] effects and ignores any stage changes the target has for this attack’s use.
The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 5 per PP spent.
Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Urshifu (Rapid Strike Style) and has a Water-Type attack on their Active List.
